channel.title: CVE Feed for Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD) -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD) -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-10598|2024-08-04T11:06:10.174Z -- becton%2C%20dickinson%20and%20company%20%28bd%29 -- pyxis%20medstation%20es%20system
item.description: In BD Pyxis MedStation ES System v1.6.1 and Pyxis Anesthesia (PAS) ES System v1.6.1, a restricted desktop environment escape vulnerability exists in the kiosk mode functionality of affected devices. Specially crafted inputs could allow the user to escape the restricted environment, resulting in access to sensitive data.
